data.name: Home Loan-Package
data.description: Our Ultimate Home Loan Package bundles together your home loan, an everyday account & our low rate credit card.  Establishment fee waivers on personal loans, no annual fee on a visa credit card, access to discounted general insurance under our package.

features.additionalInfo: 100% Mortgage Offset account for owner occupied home loans.
Discounted variable or fixed interest rate on owner-occupied and residential investment loans.  Available for interest only repayments to approved applicants.
Payments can be arranged weekly, fortnightly or monthly.
10% discount on home and contents insurance through our insurance partner for the first year.
Maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80% without Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI).
Home Loan Establishment fee waived whilst an Ultimate Home Loan Package is held.
Personal Loan Establishment fee waived whilst an Ultimate Home Loan Package is held.

constraints.additionalInfo: Available where total borrowings from the Bank are $100,000 and over.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80% without Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI) or up to 95% (owner occupied) or 90% (investment) where LMI is approved.

eligibility.additionalValue: Loans are available to members of the bank who are permanent residents of Australia and currently live in Australia.

fees.name: Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Package Fee charged on commencement of Ultimate Home Loan Package and annually on anniversary of the commencement date.  If multiple loans are held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package member can nominate applicable loan to be charged.

eligibility.additionalInfo: When multiple loans are held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package, only 1 (one) package fee is charged to the members nominated loan.

discounts.description: Another eligibility criteria exists as described in the additionalInfo field

eligibility.additionalInfo: Mortgage Settlement Fee is waived whilst loan is held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package.

discounts.description: Another eligibility criteria exists as described in the additionalInfo field

eligibility.additionalInfo: Redraw Fee is waived if completed Online.

fees.name: Other Credit Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Refer to our Fees and Charges brochure for information on other fees and charged which may apply.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Valuation Fee may be charged at time of application, the fee is payable where a valuation is required to be ordered in respect to mortgaged properties to Queensland Country Bank.
A third party may be engaged to complete the valuation and their fee willbe disclosed on application.

fees.name: Additional Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Government Fees - Company Search, Title Search Fee and DNRM Registration Fees and External Document Preparation Fee.
Government Fees include Company Search, Title Search and Department of Natural Resources Management Fees.
These fees may be charged attime of application, the fee relates to information or registration obtained from various government regulatory bodies and preparation of documents from external third parties in relation to the loan/facility.

fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance - LMI
fees.additionalInfo:
LMI Fee may be charged at time of application, the fee is payable where the maximum loan amount exceeds the relevant loan to valuation percentage as determined by Queensland Country Bank.
A third party is engaged to issue this insurance and their fee will be disclosed on application.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: 1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) Interest Only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied and investment loans is 80%. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan, or to our Interest Only SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a., as applicable.

1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) P&I. Maximum LVR for owner occupied and investment loans is 80%. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan, or to our Interest Only SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a., as applicable.

1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) Interest Only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95% and 90% for investment home loans. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. forthe life of the loan, or to our Interest Only SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a., as applicable.

Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan, or to our Interest Only SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a., as applicable.

Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan, or to our Interest Only SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a., as applicable.

Special Variable Package Loan (>80%) - Interest Only. Available for a limited time only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95% and 90% for investment loans. Interest Only maximum term of 3yrs. Includes a 2.50% pa discount off our Interest Only SVR. Following expiry of the interest only period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.35% pa discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special Variable Package Loan (<80%) - Interest Only. Available for a limited time only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied and investment is 80%. Interest Only maximum term of 3yrs. Includes a 2.70% pa discount off our Interest Only SVR. Following expiry of the interest only period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.55% pa discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special Variable Package Rate (<80%) P&I. Available for a limited time only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied and investment is 80%. Principal and Interest includes a 2.55%pa discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special Variable Package Rate (>80%) P&I. Available for a limited time only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95% and 90% for investment loans. Principal and Interest includes a 2.35%pa discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.
Standard Ultimate Home Loan Package - Interest Only
